channel.title: Owl Client on
channel.description: Recent content in Owl Client on

item.title: Quick start
item.description: Install The Owl client requires Python 3.7 or higher. The latest stable version can be installed from PyPi: pip install owl-pipeline-client Quick start Login to remote server Using your credentials owl login This will ask for your username and password. Credentials will be saved to a file in your home directory $HOME/.owlrc. Pipeline definition file List all available pipelines in the remote server using: owl pdef list If the server has been configured as per the instructions the example pipeline will be available.
